actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill for the relief of the Jefferson County Mental Health Center, Incorporated, and of certain current and former employees thereof.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to approve a claim for a refund, credit, or adjustment for overpayment of taxes by a certain named health facility upon satisfactory proof that such health facility has made a repayment to its employees for such overpayment of taxes.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of the Jefferson County Mental Health Center, Incorporated, and of certain current and former employees thereof.
